name: market for micro gas turbine, 100kW electrical | micro gas turbine, 100kW electrical | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9569/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'micro gas turbine, 100kW electrical', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;Thisis an immobile infrastructure, representing the product of a micro gas turbine system with 100 kW electrical output. It has a lifetime operation is 50,000 h.The process includes the most important materials used for production, the energy needed for production,  the transport of the raw materials and for the engine delivery and installation on the site.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
